education.institution: M B I SR SEC SCH, Kota

achievements.description: Secured All India Rank of 3609 in JEE Mains 2022 among 1.5 million candidates.
Secured All India Rank of 6705 in JEE Advanced 2022 among 1.5 lakh shortlisted candidates.
Attained Codeforces Specialist status with a top rating of 1511 & Global Rank 1885 in Codeforces Round 951.

projects.title: ShareMe - Social Media Web App
projects.description: Developed a dynamic social media platform for sharing photos, engaging through comments, and fostering community.
features: Responsive UI using React and Tailwind CSS

projects.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to detect fraudulent credit card transactions from an imbalanced dataset.
approach: Evaluated models with ROC, learning curves, F1-score, and confusion matrix
Used advanced kernel functions in SVM

projects.title: Portfolio - Web App
projects.description: Developed a responsive portfolio web app with animations and 3D graphics.
features: Framer Motion effects and Bentogrid layout

projects.title: Snake Game using Reinforcement Learning
projects.description: Developed an RL agent to autonomously play the Snake game.
approach: Designed state representation capturing game features
outcome: Average score of 27 after 1000 training episodes

extra_curricular.activity: Achieved 1st position for Badminton in Fresher’s Inferno - IITK’s inter-hall sports tournament.
